title: Martin Lodge on FIFA
itunes:author: Professor Martin Lodge, Martin Rogers
description: Contributor(s): Professor Martin Lodge, Martin Rogers | Professor Martin Lodge discusses allegations of widespread corruption at FIFA, football’s world governing body, following the launch of a US led investigation.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Martin Lodge, Martin Rogers | Professor Martin Lodge discusses allegations of widespread corruption at FIFA, football’s world governing body, following the launch of a US led investigation.
